name: Summer House Kings Cross
description:
Summer House Kings Cross offers a clean affordable accommodation, just a short walk to Kings Cross Station and Hyde Park. We are perfectly situated in a quiet street just behind the bustling Kings Cross nightlife district where you can enjoy are best pubs, clubs and restaurants Sydney has to offer. 

Summer House offers the perfect backpacker experience. Managed by a friendly, fun-loving team, weâ€™re the perfect hostel to accommodate you on your adventure to Sydney!

Our chilled out vibes mixed with a party atmosphere, means it's the perfect place to meet & socialise with other adventurers. All guests can enjoy:
Unlimited High speed WiFi,  Free Sim Cards, Surf Board Hire, Travel Discounts, Large Security Lockers (BYO padlocks), Free Tea & Coffee, Daily Organised Events & Nights Out.

Here at Summer House, we invite you to join our travel family and experience a home away from home with FREE daily events!!
Enjoy a delicious pancake breakfast with your friends, kick back and relax on the rooftop with our FREE BBQ.
Warm your belly with our FREE Nacho and Pasta nights, curl up with some popcorn on Movie night or find your competitive side and win a travel voucher in our trivia nights, hosted by our Summer Travel Team. 
 
ONSITE TRAVEL DESK
Whether you want to organise a day trip to The Blue Mountains, an Aussie East Coast Adventure, West Coast Adventure or just about anything else (incl. New Zealand, Fiji and many more), The Summer travel  experts are there to help. 

We only accept guests over 18 years old presenting a valid passport or Australian photo ID. Check-in is available from 2 pm and check-out is 10 am. 
After reception trading hours the night warden on duty will check guests in until 2am.
Luggage storage is available and guests can continue to use our facilities on the day of check out.

48 hour cancellation policy: All bookings cancelled at least 48 hours prior to check-in will not be charged. Bookings cancelled less than 48 hours prior to check-in will be charged a cancellation fee equivalent to one nights accommodation.

If you have made a reservation for more than one person, although we will try our very best, we cannot guarantee that you will be allocated beds in the same room. Please notice we are not accepting any groups bigger than 8pax.

We accept cash, EFTPOS, VISA, or MasterCard.
1.9% surcharge on all card payments 
* $20 Key deposit upon checking in

**Please note that all bookings have a 3 night minimum stay during the dates of December 30th, 31st, and January 1st and bookings during this period are non refundable**

houseRules.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: 
Guest will be able to check-in during Front Desk opening hours from 14.00 to 20.00, after reception trading hours the night manager on duty will check guests in until 2am, their mobile number will be provided on arrival date.

Only accept guests over 18 years old presenting a valid passport or ID.
* $20 Key deposit upon checking in
* 1.9% surcharge on all  card payments (No Amex accepted)


*CHECK IN: 2PM
*CHECK OUT: 10AM
*NO OUTSIDE GUESTS
*$20 KEY DEPOSIT IF KEY IS LOST/PROPERTY DAMAGED

Reception Hours: Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm and 9am - 7pm on the weekends.[we have a night manager on duty outside of these hours] Please call us upon arrival at the hostel if you need to check in outside these hours. 

 **Please note that all bookings have a 3 night minimum stay during the dates of December 30th, 31st, and January 1st and bookings during this period are non refundable**

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
